icon_scale.description: Scale of the icons relative to the font_size [[1.0-2.0]]. (default: 1.4)

margin.description:
Bar margin. Use one value for all sides or use a grouped margin for horizontal and/or
vertical definition which can each take a single value for a symmetric margin or two
values for each side, i.e.:
```json
"margin": {
    "horizontal": 10
}
```
or:
```json
"margin": {
    "vertical": [top, bottom]
}
```
You can also set individual margin on each side like this:
```json
"margin": {
    "top": 10,
    "bottom": 10,
    "left": 10,
    "right": 10,
}
```
By default, margin is set to 0 on all sides.

max_label_width.description: Max label width before text truncation (default: 400.0)

monitor.description: The monitor index or the full monitor options

mouse.description: Options for mouse interaction on the bar

padding.description:
Bar padding. Use one value for all sides or use a grouped padding for horizontal and/or
vertical definition which can each take a single value for a symmetric padding or two
values for each side, i.e.:
```json
"padding": {
    "horizontal": 10
}
```
or:
```json
"padding": {
    "horizontal": [left, right]
}
```
You can also set individual padding on each side like this:
```json
"padding": {
    "top": 10,
    "bottom": 10,
    "left": 10,
    "right": 10,
}
```
By default, padding is set to 10 on all sides.

transparency_alpha.description: Alpha value for the color transparency [[0-255]] (default: 200)

command.description: Command to execute (e.g. path to the application or shell command).

display.description: Display format for this application button (optional). Overrides global format if set.

enable.description:
Whether to enable this application button (optional).
Inherits from the global `Applications` setting if omitted.

icon.description:
Optional icon: a path to an image or a text-based glyph (e.g., from Nerd Fonts).
If not set, and if the `command` is a path to an executable, an icon might be extracted from it.
Note: glyphs require a compatible `font_family`.

show_command_on_hover.description:
Whether to show the launch command on hover (optional).
Inherits from the global `Applications` setting if omitted.

display.description:
Default display format for all applications (optional).
Could be overridden per application. Defaults to `Icon`.

enable.description: Enables or disables the applications widget.

items.description: List of configured applications to display.

show_command_on_hover.description:
Whether to show the launch command on hover (optional).
Could be overridden per application. Defaults to `false` if not set.

auto_select_under.description: Select when the current percentage is under this value [[1-100]]

hide_on_full_charge.description: Hide the widget if the battery is at full charge

oneOf.description: Use the adjustable komorebi border implementation
Use the thin Windows accent border implementation

auto_select_over.description: Select when the current percentage is over this value [[1-100]]

CustomModifiers.description: Custom format with additive modifiers for integer format specifiers

modifiers.description: Additive modifiers for integer format specifiers (e.g. { "%U": 1 } to increment the zero-indexed week number by 1)

oneOf.description: Day Date Month Year format (8 September 2024)
Show only the application name as text.
Show both the application icon and name.
Show an icon and text for the selected element, and text on the rest
Show an icon and text for the selected element, and icons on the rest
A custom FFM implementation (slightly more CPU-intensive)
Widgets are grouped as a whole

rounding.description: Rounding values for the 4 corners. Can be a single or 4 values.

transparency_alpha.description: Alpha value for the color transparency [[0-255]] (default: 200)

oneOf.description: A shadow is added under the default group. (blur: 4, offset: x-1 y-1, spread: 3)
A shadow is added under the default group. (blur: 4, offset: x-0 y-0, spread: 3)
A shadow is added under the default group. (blur: 0, offset: x-1 y-1, spread: 3)
A glow is added under the default group. (blur: 3, offset: x-1 y-1, spread: 2)
A glow is added under the default group. (blur: 3, offset: x-0 y-0, spread: 2)
A glow is added under the default group. (blur: 0, offset: x-1 y-1, spread: 2)
END OF LIFE FEATURE: Use the SW_HIDE flag to hide windows when switching workspaces (has issues with Electron apps)
Use the SW_MINIMIZE flag to hide windows when switching workspaces (has issues with frequent workspace switching)
Use the undocumented SetCloak Win32 function to hide windows when switching workspaces

name.description: Name of the Catppuccin theme (theme previews: https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin)
Name of the Base16 theme (theme previews: https://tinted-theming.github.io/tinted-gallery/)

colours.description: Colours of the custom Base16 theme palette

configurations.description: A map of display friendly name => path to configuration.json

enable.description: Enable the Komorebi Focused Container widget

show_icon.description: DEPRECATED: use `display` instead (Show the icon of the currently focused container)

Display format of the current locked state

enable.description: Enable the Komorebi Locked Container widget

show_when_unlocked.description: Show the widget event if the layer is unlocked

ignore_mouse_follows_focus.description: Wrap the {message} with a MouseFollowsFocus(false) and MouseFollowsFocus({original.value}) message (default:true)

message.description: The message to send to the komorebi client

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Yellow)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Pink)

name.description: Name of the Catppuccin theme (theme previews: https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin)

single_border.description: Border colour when the container contains a single window (default: Blue)

stack_border.description: Border colour when the container contains multiple windows (default: Green)

stackbar_focused_text.description: Stackbar focused tab text colour (default: Green)

stackbar_unfocused_text.description: Stackbar unfocused tab text colour (default: Text)

unfocused_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused (default: Base)

unfocused_locked_border.description: Border colour when the container is unfocused and locked (default: Red)

floating_border.description: Border colour when the window is floating (default: Base09)

monocle_border.description: Border colour when the container is in monocle mode (default: Base0F)

display.description: Display format of the current layer

enable.description: Enable the Komorebi Workspace Layer widget

show_when_tiling.description: Show the widget event if the layer is Tiling

auto_select_over.description: Select when the current percentage is over this value [[1-100]]

index.description: Komorebi monitor index of the monitor on which to render the bar

work_area_offset.description: Automatically apply a work area offset for this monitor to accommodate the bar

anyOf.description: The monitor index where you want the bar to show
The full monitor options with the index and an optional work_area_offset

horizontal_scroll_threshold.description: Defines how many points a user needs to scroll horizontally to make a "tick" on a mouse/touchpad/touchscreen (default: 30)

on_extra1_click.description: Command to send on extra1/back button click

on_extra2_click.description: Command to send on extra2/forward button click

on_middle_click.description: Command to send on middle button click

on_primary_double_click.description: Command to send on primary/left double button click

on_scroll_down.description: Command to send on scrolling down (every tick)

on_scroll_left.description: Command to send on scrolling left (every tick)

on_scroll_right.description: Command to send on scrolling right (every tick)

on_scroll_up.description: Command to send on scrolling up (every tick)

on_secondary_click.description: Command to send on secondary/right button click

vertical_scroll_threshold.description: Defines how many points a user needs to scroll vertically to make a "tick" on a mouse/touchpad/touchscreen (default: 30)

anyOf.description:
Execute a custom command.
CMD (%variable%), Bash ($variable) and PowerShell ($Env:variable) variables will be resolved.
Example: `komorebic toggle-pause`

oneOf.description: Swap the window container with the window container at the edge of the adjacent monitor
Insert the window container into the focused workspace on the adjacent monitor
Do nothing if trying to move a window container in the direction of an adjacent monitor

activity_left_padding.description: Characters to reserve for received and transmitted activity

auto_select.description: Select when the value is over a limit (1MiB is 1048576 bytes (1024*1024))

show_total_activity.description: Show total received and transmitted activity

received_over.description: Select the received data when it's over this value

total_received_over.description: Select the total received data when it's over this value

total_transmitted_over.description: Select the total transmitted data when it's over this value

transmitted_over.description: Select the transmitted data when it's over this value

oneOf.description: Process komorebic commands on temporarily unmanaged/floated windows
Ignore komorebic commands on temporarily unmanaged/floated windows

end.description: The desired size of the bar from the starting position (usually monitor width x desired height)

start.description: The desired starting position of the bar (0,0 = top left of the screen)

bottom.description: The bottom point in a Win32 Rect

left.description: The left point in a Win32 Rect

right.description: The right point in a Win32 Rect

top.description: The top point in a Win32 Rect

anyOf.description: All 4 corners are custom. Order: NW, NE, SW, SE

auto_hide_under.description: Hide when the current percentage is under this value [[1-100]]

auto_select_over.description: Select when the current percentage is over this value [[1-100]]

show_read_only_disks.description: Show disks that are read only. (default: false)

filter_state_changes.description: Only emit notifications when the window manager state has changed

changing_icon.description: Change the icon depending on the time. The default icon is used between 8:30 and 12:00. (default: false)

oneOf.description: Twenty-four-hour format displayed as a binary clock with circles (with seconds) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_clock)
Twenty-four-hour format displayed as a binary clock with rectangles (with seconds) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binary_clock)

anyOf.description: Show both all icons and text
Show all icons and text for the selected element, and all icons on the rest
